components.text: Ensure to wear all of the required PPE when working in the lime area as well as when performing inspections. Ensure to fill out TASC card and complete proper LOTO if necessary
Inspect both safety showers before entering
Test operation, check for cracks, loose bolts
Inspect casing, check for cracks, leaks
Check for cracks, leaks & inspect vibrator
Inspect chains, sprockets, rotary, zero speed
Inspect motor, gear box, trough, covers, piping
Ensure proper operation, chain as required
Inspect / Clean baffle plates as required
Motor, belts, gearbox, seals, piping, water adition components, shaft, bearings, unusual noise, Lime build-up , electrical and instrumentation
Clean any lime build up each round
Inspect pump casing, belts, guards and valves
Inspect sump pump cage, motor, belts, and condition
